remarks: Lemma for ~ lcfr .  Closure of vector sum when one vector is zero. TODO: share hypotheses with others.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcfrlem7.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfrlem7.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem7.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfrlem7.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem7.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfrlem7.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfrlem7.q $e |- Q = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
lcfrlem7.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfrlem7.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Q ) $.
lcfrlem7.e $e |- E = U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) $.
lcfrlem7.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
lcfrlem7.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
lcfrlem7.y $e |- ( ph -> Y = .0. ) $.
lcfrlem7 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. E ) $.
$d U g $.
$d g ph $.
